name: Nor (Vinula)
description:
Follow along Nor on their journey through the dark environments, defeat enemies, collect all the delicious snacks, and enjoy some musical bangers along the way.

Currently, the project only has one level in this prototype sadly, so it can be played through in the course of 2 minutes.

This was a project I used to apply for university. All steps in the process were solely made by me, including asset creating, programming, making the music, etc.
